name: Cajun Chicken Pasta
description: Creamy pasta with spicy Cajun-seasoned chicken, bell peppers, and a light cream sauce. Restaurant-quality at home.

instructions.instruction: Cook pasta according to package directions. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water before draining.
Season chicken strips with Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes until golden and cooked through. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, saut√© bell pepper and onion for 4-5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
Pour in cream and chicken broth. Bring to a simmer.
Add Parmesan and stir until melted and smooth.
Return chicken to the pan. Add cooked pasta and toss.
Add pasta water if needed to thin the sauce. Garnish with parsley.

tips: Whole wheat pasta adds fiber and nutrients.
Make your own Cajun seasoning for less sodium.
Great for meal prep - reheats well.
storageInfo: Refrigerate for up to 4 days. Add a splash of cream when reheating.
servingSuggestion: Serve with garlic bread and a side salad.
variations: Use light cream or milk for a lighter version.
